title: Re-inventing Japan: Nation, Culture, Identity (Japan in the Modern World)
features: This text rethinks the contours of Japanese history, culture and nationality. Challenging the mythology of a historically unitary, even monolithic Japan, it offers a different perspective on culture and identity in modern Japan.
